CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 学；学习；学会；学到；习得；了解；获悉；熟悉；记住；记忆；熟记；背熟；发现；使知晓；领会

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 博学的；有学问的；学术上的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。
通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况，侧重从不知到知的变化过程。
普通用词，多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识，含直接知道的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 从...中学习；从...得到教益；向...学习
了解；学习有关...的, 了解有关...的内容
吸取教训；得到教训；引以为戒

bilingual.target: 所以要明智地学习并学好。
她可以学习更多的单词。

bilingual.source: Where I like to learn all day.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢整天在这里学习。

list.abstract: learn（英 [lɜːn]，美 [lɜːrn]），英语单词，作动词为学习；学会；教导。短语搭配有learn from（从...中学习）。例句为“I do appreciate this chance to learn the beautiful art（我真的很感激有机会学习这门美丽的艺术）！” learn相关近义词有to study、linken等。

yingyinNormal.en: We've all had bad days, but we learn, and we stick together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都有过不顺心的时候，但总能学着生存，而且非常团结。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you learn these things. You grow into it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，这些是要学习的，你会逐渐学会的。

yingyinNormal.en: Learn all you can about them and report back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学习你们能学到的关于他们的一切，回来做报告。

yingyinNormal.en: If you're prepare to adapt and learn, you can transform.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要你准备好适应并学习，你就可以逆转。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I'm really glad you decided to learn mandarin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道，我真的很高兴你决定学习普通话。

yingyinNormal.en: And from now on, I was going to somehow learn how to get it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从此，我开始学习如何抓住它。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. But you yourself admit the software will learn. So there must be something to be learned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，可是你自己承认，这款软件还需要学习，也就是说，它还有东西需要学习。

yingyinNormal.en: And your brain is designed to learn a language through conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的大脑天生就是要用对话学习语言。

yingyinNormal.en: Where'd you get the nice locket? Shh, I come here to learn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这漂亮的吊坠是从哪儿弄的？嘘，我是来学习的。

yingyinNormal.en: Good morning and welcome to World History. Who's ready to learn?
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上好，欢迎来上世界历史课，准备好学习了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not trying to trick you, Mr. Ephraham. If the software learns, then it must not know what it needs to learn, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是给你挖坑，以法连先生，如果软件在学习，也就是说它并不知道自己要学习什么，对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, everyone, for staying late to learn our new iPad order system.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢大家关门后特意留下来学习新的iPad点餐系统。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks, Riley, you're right. I'm gonna try to learn everything I can about this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你，莱丽，你是对的，我会尽我所能去学习一切。

yingyinNormal.en: Here are the labs where students learn to design and build the doors to the human world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是实验室，学生会学习设计和建造通往人类世界的门。

yingyinNormal.en: I really want a kid. And when that day finally comes, I'll learn how to be a good dad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很想要孩子，有了孩子以后，我会学习如何做是个好爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: The knife, for example, is the last thing you learn. Okay? Okay. Position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿刀来举个例子，刀是你要学习的最后一件武器，明白吗？好的。找位置。

yingyinNormal.en: Find yours. Find yours. Learn from each other. Otherwise, we don't stand a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 找出你的故事。互相学习。,否则我们就浪费了这次机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone here is very different. So many many things to learn. Always very little sleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里有各种各样的人，要学习的东西也太多太多，但睡眠又太少太少。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you refuse to learn that, I guarantee you, you guys will not become the best person you can be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你拒绝学习历史，我保证你们一定无法做到最好的自己。

yingyinNormal.en: If you've never tried surfing, pack your board-shorts, this is the place to learn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果您从来没有试过冲浪，就快快收拾好装备，来个这个冲浪好去处学习吧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 听说; 得知; 获悉

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 从...中学习；从...得到教益；向...学习

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 博学的；有学问的；学者的；学术的

word_family.mean: v. 学习；学会；教导；背；得知；获悉；记诵

sense_info_list.en: gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in something by study, experience, or being taught

examination_example.sentence: They can also <highlight>learn</highlight> geometry by assembling a bicycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们还可以通过组装自行车来学习几何。

examination_example.sentence: There are lessons about informed patient consent to <highlight>learn</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一些关于患者知情同意的课程需要学习。

examination_example.sentence: I want to share these old truths I've <highlight>learned</highlight> along the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想分享这些我一路上学到的古老真理。

sense_info_list.en: become aware of something by information or from observation
sense_info_list.zh: 听说; 得知; 获悉

examination_example.sentence: It can be <highlight>learned</highlight> that with Obamacare, employment is no longer a precondition to get insurance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可以看出，有了奥巴马医改，就业不再是获得保险的先决条件。

examination_example.sentence: Airborne technologies allow archaeologists to <highlight>learn</highlight> about what lies beneath the ground without digging.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机载技术可以让考古学家不用挖掘就能知道地底下有什么东西。

examination_example.sentence: What can be <highlight>learned</highlight> from the last paragraph?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从最后一段可以得知什么？

examination_example.sentence: Every time we fail at something, we can choose to look for the lesson we're meant to <highlight>learn</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每当我们在某件事上失败时，我们可以选择寻找我们应该学到的教训。

examination_example.sentence: Failure can also teach us things about ourselves that we would never have <highlight>learned</highlight> otherwise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失败也能教会我们关于自己的东西，否则我们永远也认识不到。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps it's time to <highlight>learn</highlight> a few lessons from them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许是时候从中吸取一些教训了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 超量学习（指学习或熟记到能立即回忆起的程度）
adj. 博学的；有学问的；学者的；学术的

word_family.mean: v. 学习；学会；教导；背；得知；获悉；记诵

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 从...中学习；从...得到教益；向...学习
了解；学习有关...的；了解有关...的内容

sense_info_list.en: gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in something by study, experience, or being taught

examination_example.sentence: It enables people to <highlight>learn</highlight> and grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它使人们能够学习和成长。

examination_example.sentence: It isn't a school subject or an academic discipline, but it can be <highlight>learned</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不是一门学校科目或学术学科，但它是可以习得的。

examination_example.sentence: Natural sciences should be <highlight>learned</highlight> the way humanities courses are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自然科学应该像人文课程一样学习。

sense_info_list.en: become aware of something by information or from observation

examination_example.sentence: What do we <highlight>learn</highlight> about Goddard's idea of using rockets for space exploration?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于Goddard的使用火箭进行太空探索的想法，我们了解到什么？

examination_example.sentence: What do we <highlight>learn</highlight> about the man from the conversation?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从对话中我们了解到这位男士的什么信息？

examination_example.sentence: What do we <highlight>learn</highlight> about the possible reason why women tend to live longer?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于女性更长寿的可能原因，我们了解到了什么？

examination_example.sentence: When they started researching the supply chain, they <highlight>learned</highlight> that only 2-3%of all bison is actually grass-fed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们开始研究供应链时，他们发现所有野牛中实际上只有2～3%是真的草饲。

examination_example.sentence: Joseph has <highlight>learned</highlight> that a farmer has to have a certain mindset to successfully convert.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Joseph 意识到农户必须具有一定的头脑才能成功转变。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) having much knowledge acquired by study

word_usage.usage:
knowledge不能与learn连用。
误 You have learned some knowledge here.
正 You have learned something here.
learn doing sth强调学习的过程; learn to do sth强调学习的结果。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识, 含直接知道的意味。
通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况, 侧重从不知到知的变化过程。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 博学的；有学问的；学者的；学术的

word_family.mean: v. 学习；学会；教导；背；得知；获悉；记诵

sense_info_list.en: gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in something by study; experience; or being taught

examination_example.sentence: They have little talent for <highlight>learning</highlight> math.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们没有学习数学的天赋。

examination_example.sentence: Parents should encourage their child to take the risks needed to <highlight>learn</highlight> and grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母应该鼓励他们的孩子去冒险，去学习和成长。

examination_example.sentence: Students of ethnic backgrounds <highlight>learn</highlight> better from a multicultural curriculum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 具有种族背景的学生在多元文化课程中学习得更好。

sense_info_list.en: become aware of something by information or from observation

examination_example.sentence: What do we <highlight>learn</highlight> from the passage about?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从文章中我们可以了解到什么？

examination_example.sentence: This way, patients not only <highlight>learn</highlight> about which foods to buy, but also how to prepare them at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样一来，患者不仅可以了解到该买哪些食物，还可以了解到如何在家里准备这些食物。

examination_example.sentence: How can new graduate students <highlight>learn</highlight> who their advisers are?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究生如何获悉他们的导师是谁?

examination_example.sentence: Initially, kids <highlight>learn</highlight> numbers much like they <highlight>learn</highlight> letters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初，孩子们学习数字就像他们学习字母一样。

word_usage.usage:
knowledge不能与learn连用。
误 You have learned some knowledge here.
正 You have learned something here.
learn doing sth强调学习的过程; learn to do sth强调学习的结果。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识，含直接知道的意味。
通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况，侧重从不知到知的变化过程。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 开始醒悟; 开始明白

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 向...学习；意识到；吸取教训

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 博学的；有学问的；学者的；学术的

word_family.mean: v. 学习；学会；教导；背；得知；获悉；记诵

sense_info_list.en: gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in something by study, experience, or being taught

examination_example.sentence: Children should <highlight>learn</highlight> a second language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们应该学习第二语言。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>learn</highlight> to use social media, because it allows them to get to know the outside world better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学会使用社交媒体，因为这可以让他们更好地了解外部世界。

examination_example.sentence: It's never too late to <highlight>learn</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学习永远不嫌晚。

sense_info_list.en: to be told facts or information that you did not know

examination_example.sentence: I was upset to <highlight>learn</highlight> that many sea animals eat plastic garbage, thinking it is food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 得知许多海洋动物会吃塑料垃圾并以为这是食物时，我非常难过。

examination_example.sentence: What can we <highlight>learn</highlight> about people who are involved in artistic activities?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于从事艺术活动的人，我们能得知什么？

examination_example.sentence: If I <highlight>learned</highlight> of a company that used a lot of plastic, I'd send it an email urging it to cut back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我得知一家公司大量使用塑料，我会给它发一封电子邮件，敦促它减少使用。

sense_info_list.en: to start to understand that you must change the way you behave
sense_info_list.zh: 开始醒悟; 开始明白

examination_example.sentence: It was important for me to <highlight>learn</highlight> that you don't have to always get everything right the first time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我来说重要的是我开始明白，你不必总是在第一次就把每件事都做好。

examination_example.sentence: She gives me the freedom to make mistakes, and to <highlight>learn</highlight> from them all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她给了我犯错的自由，让我可以从中吸取教训。

examination_example.sentence: William Hastie once suggested that history informs us of past mistakes from which we can <highlight>learn</highlight> without repeating them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威廉·黑斯蒂曾经提出，历史告诉我们过去的种种错误，让我们可以从中吸取教训，而不必重蹈覆辙。

sense_info_list.en: to make yourself remember a piece if writing by reading it or repeating it many times

word_usage.usage:
“知道”通常由know表示，如果由不知道变为知道，则常用learn来表示：
When did you learn it (get to know it)?
你什么时候知道这件事的？

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识，含直接知道的意味。
通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况，侧重从不知到知的变化过程。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 学习；认识到；得知；（learn的过去式和过去分词）
adj. 博学的；有学问的；学者的；学术的

word_family.mean: v. 学习；学会；教导；背；得知；获悉；记诵

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吸取教训；得到教训；引以为戒
得知...；学习...；了解有关...的内容

sense_info_list.en: gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in something by study, experience, or being taught

examination_example.sentence: Linda expresses that she also wants to <highlight>learn</highlight> about Chinese culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 琳达表示，她也想学习中国文化。

examination_example.sentence: His perfect moves make it even harder to believe that this kid <highlight>learned</highlight> these skills in less than two years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他完美的动作让人们更难相信这个孩子在不到两年的时间里学会了这些技能。

examination_example.sentence: If you don't know what you want to do, you should ask yourself what you like to <highlight>learn</highlight> about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不知道你想做什么，你应该问问自己你喜欢学习什么。

examination_example.sentence: And they begin to <highlight>learn</highlight> their responsibility in a family or a group.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且他们开始认识到自己在家庭或团体中的责任。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>learned</highlight> that although most of us are different from each other—sometimes in big ways—we are still mostly the same in our hearts and minds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认识到，尽管我们大多数人彼此不同——有时在很大程度上——但我们在内心和思想上仍然基本相同。

examination_example.sentence: I truly <highlight>learned</highlight> the meaning of what my mother said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真正理解了我母亲所说的话的含义。

sense_info_list.en: become aware of something by information or from observation

examination_example.sentence: Li Zixuan <highlight>learned</highlight> that the first man flew into space in 1961 and later, more astronauts succeeded in traveling into space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 李子轩得知，在1961年就有人首次进入太空，后来，更多的宇航员成功地进入太空。

examination_example.sentence: Zhou said she was a little surprised when she <highlight>learned</highlight> that she was so popular online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周说，当她得知自己在网上如此受欢迎时，她有点惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: We can <highlight>learn</highlight> from the passage that Mr. Green was pleased with his son.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以从这段话中得知，格林先生对他的儿子很满意。

word_usage.usage:
knowledge不能与learn连用。
误 You have learned some knowledge here.
正 You have learned something here.
learn doing sth强调学习的过程; learn to do sth强调学习的结果。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指通过学习、练习或由别人教授以获得某种知识或技能，侧重学习的成果。
指花费时间阅读、上课等以学习学科知识，侧重学习的过程；也指仔细观察以研究某事物。
普通用词，多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识，含直接知道的意味。
通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况，侧重从不知到知的变化过程。
指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。
